ygData.subject: Re: Spell Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Make your L20 pet spell when you are 21 and . .. everytime you lvl put more points into research . . .    and practice makes perfect.   :-)  Make sure you have
ygData.messageBody:
Make your L20 pet spell when you are 21 and . ..

everytime you lvl put more points into research . . . and practice makes
perfect. :-) Make sure you have the right recipes for the spells, one web
site I read had some stuff wrong! grrrrrrr



>
> WTF! i tried to make my L20 pet spell and blew it 3 times! wow, big
deal,
> i increased each time. and i think i drove people crazy getting the words
> in the first place. ya, and i know i can buy it in the sk guilds. im prob
> gonna just do that (cheap bastard).
>
> belphenor
>
>
>
